data.tdata: Server Side Scripting (CGI): Maverick Webdesign Ltd. provides CGI (Common Gateway Interface) scripts to handle all your server side scripting needs. We provide the web community, web designers, and web developers with high quality CGI scripts and modules capable of handling database access and queries, email support, handling of XML (eXtensible Markup Language) documents, and any server side functionality you might need.

Client Side Scripting (JavaScript): Our JavaScript team can deliver the client side scripts you need to enhance your dynamic HTML (HyperText Markup Language) pages and adds functionalities to your creations. Utilizing the DOM (Document Object Model) capabilities of modern browsers we can give you the complete control and the artistic freedom that these technologies makes possible. The combination of JavaScript, CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) and the W3C (World Wide Web Consortium) DOM Level 1 and DOM Level 2 standards that, even though not completely supported by all, modern browsers provide gives you a new level of creative freedom when designing web pages.

Web Site Development & Design: We build websites for both companies and the general public. For companies we develop complete web site solutions, and for private persons, who want their own web site, we develop smaller sites according to your ideas. We also have ideas and solutions for both company and private sites. Your ideas and requests will be implemented and we will assist you in finding a productive solution that best serves your company and enhances your company profile.

Hosting Solutions: Maverick Webdesign Ltd. will be able to provide a wide veriety of hosting solutions to suite every need in late 2004. For more information about our Hosting products come back and visit us a little later or contact info@maverick-web.com.
